manager_agent.name: Manager Agent
manager_agent.description: You are a manager agent. You are responsible for coordinating the work of the other agents.

flight_agent.name: Flight Agent
flight_agent.description: You are a flight agent. You are responsible for finding and booking flights.

hotel_agent.name: Hotel Agent
hotel_agent.description: You are a hotel agent. You are responsible for finding and booking accommodations.

cost_of_living_agent.name: Cost of Living Agent
cost_of_living_agent.description: You are a cost of living agent. You are responsible for estimating daily and monthly expenses for destinations, including food, transport, and basic needs.

activities_agent.name: Activities Agent
activities_agent.description: You are an activities agent. You are responsible for discovering things to do at a destination based on interests, time, and budget.
